channel.title: Cvs on Elena Gazzarrini
channel.description: Recent content in Cvs on Elena Gazzarrini

item.description:
Education

  • King’s College London London, UK

    Msci in Physics 09/2016 – 07/2020

  • Berkeley University of California Berkeley, US

    Third Year Abroad, Physics Bachelor 09/2018 – 05/2019

  • Liceo Classico V. Gioberti Turin, Italy

    Studi Classici Superiori 09/2011 - 07/2016

Publications

Gazzarrini, E., Cersonsky, R.K., Bercx, M. et al. The rule of four: anomalous distributions in the stoichiometries of inorganic compounds. npj Comput. Mater. 10, 73 (2024).

Bhattacharjee P., Bird I., Calore F., Doglioni C., Eckner C., Gazzarrini E., Heinrich L., Hryn`ova T., Ippolito V., Little J., Serjeant S., Smirnov M. (2023) ESCAPE Dark Matter Science Project for EOSC Future project (WP6.3). ARPHA Preprints.
